name: daintiness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being small and delicate: They admired the softness of the baby's cheeks and the daintiness of his lips. The small dog combined daintiness with intelligence. See
dainty
More examplesFewer examplesShe kept praising the charms of her mistress and the daintiness of her clothes.Despite her daintiness, Jo can act tough.The daintiness and colouring of these plants is almost unreal.
